item.description:
I am a last-year undergraduate student at Tsinghua University, majoring in Electronic Engineering and double-majoring in Economics.

Currently I work in Professor Gao Huang’s lab for interesting topics in Resource-Efficient Deep Learning. I interned at Baidu Robotics Lab since Spring 2019, advised by Professor Ruigang Yang. Before that, I was a research intern at DKI Group of Microsoft Research Asia in 2018-2019, advised by Qingwei Lin.

I am visiting IFP Group at UIUC since july 2019, advised by Professor Thomas M. Huang and Professor Humphery H. Shi.

My research interests lie in efficient and hardware-friendly machine learning and its applications.
